content.content: Hello OP Community!  A few of us were thinking that it would be beneficial to have a weekly/biweekly community governance call.  In the call we would discuss previous governance polls, upcoming and current governance polls, proposal feedback and any relevant governance issues.  It would also be an opportunity for community members to connect and have open discussions.  I am happy to facilitate until someone else can take over. First Call Tuesday, August 2nd 10am PT/1pm ET, 7pm CET Cadence Biweekly Agenda Template Previous Voting Cycle Results Current Voting Cycle Upcoming Governance Cycle Open Discussion - proposal feedback, governance issues and feedback, etc Location Join Zoom Meeting   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 964 3417 4431 Passcode: 368400 Please message me if you would like to be added to the agenda!

absolutely wee need this, I prefer Mondays and biweekly, also ordinary community members should be speakers in these meetings if they have something to say about related topics I think there should be a registration form for these people and a quota also limited time, all the best
Thanks for initiating this! I would prefer biweekly. I have another recurring meeting conflict on Monday so would prefer Tuesday but can occasionally skip it to make the call.
Completely agree, would likely be best to do this bi-weekly imo. Would love to catch up with everyone.
Absolutely agree  it will be better for understanding each other.
As an anon, I won’t be participating in calls, however I hope they will be livestreamed on YouTube etc.

Just reposting from Discord, but we can set up a delegate call channel in Discord where you can do voice/video, and only delegates with the delegate role can talk. That way the whole community can watch, and chat live!

This sounds like a great idea. Both for growing a stronger community and also a more informed one. Count me in, provided my schedule allows it. I like the sound of a bi-weekly chat, maybe mid-week to keep the spirits high?

Biweekly calls (every two weeks) makes perfect sense. Setup a discord channel and invite the main delegators into it. Its like the wild west now and we need some framework; these discussions will help keep things organized.

This call would actually be open to anyone in the community.  We could set up another call down the road that’s specific to delegates, but this would be a call be for anyone in the OP community to participate.
I think this is the best idea tbh, would you be able to set up that channel Vee?
the best  idea thats good

Great idea. I’m very keen to attend and observe, and make it a regular & fixed spot in my calendar. As with others I’d prefer biweekly, and my personal preference is Tuesdays. I look forward to following this thread to see when details are released. Cheers, Axel
Indeed, the best idea

Bi-weekly is a good option as weekly might be too frequent for the community. As others have said, it would be great to have these uploaded to youtube. A separate thread to record the bi-weekly community calls with youtube links and an agenda would be great too.
Sounds good, biweekly would be a lot easier for some that work alot
I’m all in for this!

Any update on this? Can a OP mod create a private thread in the discord and get this started. We can make the call to anyone, but only have folks with the delegate role speak. Lets aim for August 2nd at 1pm est/10am PT/7pm CET for our first one?

Supportive of this idea. Legitimizes OP as a DAO and its commitment to token holders and the community. Let’s get something on the book and stick with it - becomes extremely burdensome catering to individual schedules.

I would prefer to have it open for anyone to speak, not just delegates.  @vonnie610 mentioned they were going to create a discussion channel.  I personally like the idea of a video/voice call.  The start date of August 2nd with a biweekly cadence works well.  I updated the details below.  We need someone to create a Zoom link and facilitate the call.  I’m happy to do it if there are no other takers. Date/Time: August 2nd 10am PT/1pm ET/7pm CET Cadence Biweekly Proposed Agenda Previous governance poll results Upcoming governance cycle Current governance cycle Proposal feedback Governance issues Open discussion
why would we make it open for anyone to speak though? Mainly what we want is for delegates t coordinate better and I don’t think having the entire community speak on a call would help with that

I think of a Community call as something different than a Delegate call.  A Community call should be open for anyone to speak about governance issues and share their thoughts.  A Delegate call is definitely something that can be organized as well, but I would like to keep the Governance call open for anyone in the community to speak and participate.

Hi @katie , thank you for this. I agree community call should be open but I am also skeptical that open call might lead this into something like twitch stream where we see more noise and filtering actual comment would be a difficult task. I hope you are planning to moderate this at least for first couple of rounds.

I’m happy to moderate, I wasn’t sure if there was someone else that would be interested but I have years of experience facilitating company wide All Hands calls so can definitely do this until someone else wants to step in
Thank you for the infinite reliability of Optimism.
katie:  Location Zoom   why dont we use discord?
I’m not familiar with Discord meetings.  If you would like to set up the meeting via Discord feel free!  Otherwise, if I’m scheduling it I will use Zoom since that’s what I’m comfortable with.

What about meeting in the middle (WRT to open/vs only delegates)? In Discord we can use the stage. By default only the delegates will be able to unmute & talk, but general community can raise their hands (very similar to zoom/hangouts) then we can unmute them. That way we still have community involvement but it does not get too noisy as @OPUser mentioned, which is a real concern.  @katie Date/Time: August 2nd 10am PT/1pm ET/7pm CET  This time works great for me, I am happy to sit quietly facilitating so you can focus on the content.
Thanks for initiating this! I would prefer biweekly and Saturday. I hope you upload the call on Youtube for someone who can’t join this.

Hi all, I’m sorry to be a pain in the behind, but is there any chance that the time can be shifted for future meetings? I’m based on the east coast of Australia and the current meeting time is at 3am in the morning, which is neither a ‘late night’ nor an ‘early morning’. Being based in this time zone, I’m used to odd hours to line up with overseas, but 3am is pretty hard to attend. 1am Sydney time or 5am Sydney time is far more appealing, i.e. a ‘late night’ or ‘early morning’ situation, but any shift would be greatly appreciated. What’s everyone else’s thoughts? Does the current time work for all of you? If there are others who find this time slot tricky, please speak up, as it may convince the community to shift the time. Thanks for your consideration. Kind regards, Axel
完全同意，最好每两周做一次 imo。很想赶上大家。
i like the idea, pls do it
